title: SESP SESP 317-0-20 Gender and the Life Course

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1) Taking Sides: Clashing Views in Gender Seventh Edition by Elizabeth Schroder (ISBN-13: 978-1259171031, ISBN-10: 1259171035)
2) Pink Brain, Blue Brain: How Small Differences Grow Into Troublesome Gaps - And What We Can Do About It by Lise Eliot
3) Queen Bees and Wannabes: Helping Your Daughter Survive Cliques, Gossip, Boyfriends, and the New Realities of Girl World by Rosalind Wiseman
4) Masterminds and Wingmen: Helping Our Boys Cope with Schoolyard Power, Locker-Room Tests, Girlfriends, and the New Rules of Boy World by Rosalind Wiseman
5) Real Boys by Mary Pipher
6) Reviving Ophelia by Mary Pipher

subject: SESP
